about_the_game:
The Ghost - Task of the Ghost Hunters is a single player game. Your job is to find ghosts and solve puzzles. The puzzles are an important part of the game The Ghost – Task of the Ghost Hunters. There are small houses to larger multi-story houses and you will have to solve several puzzles.

Difficulty levels:


There are four different difficulty levels that increase the excitement and realism of the game. If you get easy tips every now and then on the difficulty level, you have to fight your way through the house alone and without tips on the highest difficulty level. The level of difficulty in escaping the ghost also depends. With a low difficulty level, you can still easily hide from the ghost when the ghost is chasing you. If the difficulty level is high, you won't be able to hide as easily and the ghost will be harder to find.

  • Day/night cycle
  • Graphics: There is realistic graphics.
  • Levels: There are more than five levels in which you have to hunt the ghosts. There are small and large to multi-story houses.
  • Puzzles: There are more than 10 different puzzles to solve. The number of puzzles depends on the size of the house
  • Difficulty level: There are four different difficulty levels (easy, medium, hard, horror). With each level of difficulty, the aggressiveness of the mind increases and the puzzles become more difficult to solve.
  • Ghosts: There will be more than five ghosts. Every spirit has different abilities.
  • Sound: A realistic sound makes the horror experience more intense.

content_descriptors.notes: There could be small bloody spots.
